source.author: Short, P.S.
source.title: Leucochrysum
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Short, P.S. (1999). Leucochrysum. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Perennial herbs, more or less woody at base; lamina of intermediate involucral bracts yellow or white; widespread
Annual herbs; apparently rare species of northern plains
Leaves obovate; inner involucral bracts white; rare in higher alps (e.g. Bogong High Plains)
Leaves more or less linear; inner involucral bracts yellow or white; widespread, but rare in higher alps
